Gracefully deprecate ViewPropTypes (#232)

Gracefully deprecate ViewPropTypes

use ViewPropTypes.style instead of View.props.style (#229)

closes #230

Merge pull request #215 from robrichard/master

add missing variables from props

Merge pull request #214 from robrichard/master

Allow accessibility label for navbar button
allow accessibility label for navbar button

Merge pull request #209 from doxiaodong/master

Use `data.style` to customize title `Text` element

Merge pull request #207 from react-native-community/chore/cleanup

Adjust repo codestyle

Merge pull request #136 from JeremDsgn/master

Add containerStyle as a props

Merge pull request #200 from kh0r/master

Fix links in example README.md

Merge pull request #199 from bakery/disabled-buttons

Add disabled attribute to buttons
Added ability to specify title style property
Style change of status bar was lagging

Adds `statusBar.animated` and fixes animation bugs

The new `animated` property of the `statusBar` prop object affects
both `style` and `hidden` when they are changed. Fixes bugs so the
animations play. (They have to be passed in the StatusBar calls.)

React API must be now required from react package (previously a warning on 0.25)

See https://github.com/facebook/react-native/releases/tag/v0.25.1

This will become a breaking change in 0.26+

Fixed imperative API

In my case, with react-native 0.22, `StatusBar.barStyle = data.style` won't work as expected. But `setBarStyle` did work.
make the NavbarButton more Higher(Stretch in vertical), so that It will be pressed more easily.
Use flex box style to make buttons and title align center in vertical, instead of using fixed margin or padding.
StatusBarIOS is deprecated, change to StatusBar
Fixes status bar tint color bug
Add semicolons per ES6 standard (Babel requires it)

module.exports

depending on node.js version adding the export line on the class line is invalid.

Update semver

Use http://semver.npmjs.com/ for testing.
Added delimiter property to display â€” Fixes #110

Fix invariant error when passing an element as a navbar button

Fixes #95

Note usage with webpack and example config

* Fixes https://github.com/Kureev/react-native-navbar/issues/76
updated README to reflect new signiture for onPrev and onNext
exposed navigator and route object to onPrev and onNext

Allow "shouldUpdate" to be configurable

There should be a way to update the title or the buttons of the navigation bar if the user wants to.
fixed #38 replaced dependencies with peerDependencies in package.json

New "statusBar" to change StatusBarIOS color

If we have dark backgroundColor for our header we want to change StatusBarIOS color to white.
We can choose from lightContent (white) or default (black) color.
Without setting statusBar current setting is not changed.
Custom button color style don't rely on backgroundColor
Allow custom style property for navigation bar
fix for width after react-native 0.4.1 update
